advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners and runners-up in League A advanced to Quarter-finals
advancements.relegated_playoff_notes: Third-placed teams in League A qualified for relegation play-offs vs runners-up in League B
advancements.relegated_notes: Fourth-placed teams in League A relegated to League B

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners in League B promoted to League A
advancements.advanced_playoff_notes: Group runners-up in League B  qualified for promotion play-offs vs third-placed teams in League A
advancements.relegated_playoff_notes: Third-placed teams in League B qualified for relegation play-offs vs runners-up in League C
advancements.relegated_notes: Fourth-placed teams in League B relegated to League C

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners in League C promoted to League B
advancements.advanced_playoff_notes: Group runners-up in League C  qualified for promotion play-offs vs third-placed teams in League B
advancements.relegated_notes: The 2 best fourth-placed teams in League C qualified for relegation play-offs vs runners-up in League D - The 2 worst fourth-placed teams in League C relegated to League D

matches.awarded_notes: Awarded: The Romania vs Kosovo match was suspended at 0–0 during second-half stoppage time, after the Kosovo team left the pitch, with the match abandoned thereafter. The match was subsequently awarded as a 3–0 win for Romania.

advancements.advanced_notes: Group winners in League D promoted to League C
advancements.advanced_playoff_notes: Group runners-up in League D  qualified for promotion play-offs vs the 2 best fourth-placed teams in League C
